thread.title: Palatine Police Find Shooting Victim Outside Walmart
thread.title_full: Palatine Police Find Shooting Victim Outside Walmart

title: Palatine Police Find Shooting Victim Outside Walmart
text:
Palatine Police Find Shooting Victim Outside Walmart February 7, 2017 8:39 PM By Jeremy Ross 
(CBS) â€” Police in northwest suburban Palatine responded Tuesday evening to a shooting outside a Walmart store. 
The incident occurred around 7:30 p.m. outside the Rand Road store, police said. 
Walmart representatives declined comment. 
Fire officials said the victim is a 19-year-old Chicago man but would not provide additional details. 
Further information was not available. 
Jeremy Ross Jeremy Ross is a general assignment reporter for CBS 2. Jeremy joined the station in July 2014. He is an award-winning journalist, who came to CBS 2 from WITI-TV in Milwaukee. Before that, he worked in Lansing, Mich. Jeremy, who is...
